high_descs: Head rotate and turn left to the coffee table.
Pick the pepper shaker from the coffee table.
Turn left and turn left to the desk lamp.
anns.task_desc: Examine a pepper shaker by the light of a tall lamp.

high_descs: Turn around and walk to the coffee table.
Pick up the pepper shaker from the side table.
Go straight and turn left towards the room near desk lamp.
anns.task_desc: Pick up the pepper shaker and Turn on the desk lamp.

high_descs:
Turn around turn right go straight to the coffee  table 
Take the pepper  shaker  of table  
Turn around  go straight walk near to the desk lamp

turn on the lamp
anns.task_desc: Examine a pepper  shaker by the light of a tall lamp.
